fr.upmc.datacenter.software.step3.largescalecoordination.implementation.admissioncontrollercoordination

Class AdmissionControllerCoordination

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.upmc.datacenter.software.admissioncontroller.ResourceInspector
        • fr.upmc.datacenter.software.step2.AdmissionController
          • fr.upmc.datacenter.software.step3.largescalecoordination.implementation.admissioncontrollercoordination.AdmissionControllerCoordination
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.ComponentI, AdmissionRequestHandlerI, CoordinationLargeScaleI

    public class AdmissionControllerCoordination
extends AdmissionController
implements CoordinationLargeScaleI

    Descriptor class

    This class represents the controller of the topology and the arbiter of the DataCenter in the large scale, this class supervise the passage of ApplicationVMcoordinate URIs on the network and decide when should release ApplicationVMcoordinate This component create at the beginning using all available resources ComputerAdaptable a set of ApplicationVMcoordinate and deploy it, and push their URIs on the network in order to be used by the Controller and to do cooperation between Controllers Coordinator
    Author:
    Hacene KASDI
